title: Persona 3 USA UNDUB 1.02 Patch-Kotoba
description:
-= Kotoba Presents =-

                     Persona 3 *UNDUB* *REMIX* 1.02 Patch


         -------------------------------------------------------------
         +...RELEASE INFO...+
         ____________________

            Rls Date:  2008-01-27            Region:      N/A
            Format:    XDELTA                Image Size:  N/A
            Files:     1 * 12 MB             Platform:    N/A


         -------------------------------------------------------------
         +...RELEASE NOTES...+
         _____________________

         This patch will update Persona 3 UNDUB 1.0 to 1.02.
         NOTE: It will only work on the original 1.0 ISO.

         Changes/Fixes:
            *The 2nd school semester BGM is replaced with a better
             version (loop is no longer noticeable and the remixed
             track is overall better).
            *Jin&#039;s battlevoices that were still in english are now
             in japanese.
            *The last movie before the ending is now subbed (due to
             some fuckup while rebuilding the final version, that
             movie wasn&#039;t subbed like it should have been... :P).

         As far as I know there&#039;s nothing left to fix, so hopefully it
         will be the final patch for this UNDUB. ;)


         You&#039;ll need about 8.5GB of free HDD space.

         *Copy "koto-p3undub.iso" to the folder where all the files of
          the patch are.
         *Run "koto-p3undub1.02patch.bat".
         *Once the patching process is over, you&#039;ll have a new patched
          ISO, "koto-p3undub1.02.iso".


         -------------------------------------------------------------
         +...CONTACT...+
         _______________

         Find us. ;)
